author: DryRun
body: Fixes the digi size reference (HB, HE from 10 to 8) for the summary plots. Also moves the location of the reference from C++ (HcalCommon/interface/Constants.h) to python (DigiTask.py, and copied via import to HcalOnlineHarvesting.py and HcalOfflineHarvesting.py).
title: HCALDQM: Fix digi size reference for summary plots (10_1_X)
